TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: Wow, I have 53! I got 49 in 9 days, insane!

Literally 5 points away. O\_O  

EDIT: Not anymore; two light green bars now! :)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-24T22:34:37Z" title="11/24/2015 10:34  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 24, 2015</time> by Norpo**

14 points.  

(come on, bring on the rep so i can have a second bar before rep turns into dots!!!)

[quote name='UnionPacific1983WP']14 points.  

(come on, bring on the rep so i can have a second bar before rep turns into dots!!!)[/QUOTE]  

I tried but it says I must spread some around. BTW, I do have graphics for the green bars. See link in my sig for the images once we go to the green dot.  

I still need 100 for my next bar.
20 reps people! It's not that hard!

Sat this point I'm 128 away from bar 2 on the light green, a goal that is likely not to be reached because of the software update but I sure could get closer!  

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m9gW5u0.png[/IMG]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-25T13:18:28Z" title="11/25/2015 01:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 25, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

[quote name='SaturnianBlue']Sat this point I'm 128 away from bar 2 on the light green, a goal that is likely not to be reached because of the software update but I sure could get closer!  

[URL]http://i.imgur.com/m9gW5u0.png[/URL][/QUOTE]The rep will not be removed or reset on the 27th as far as I know.
I know, but the Light Green is technically doomed, since the bars are being removed and it'll just be a dot with a number.
[quote name='SaturnianBlue']I know, but the Light Green is technically doomed, since the bars are being removed and it'll just be a dot with a number.[/QUOTE]Are you serious?! SQUAD why you do dis.
Ooh, only 9 points away... I should probably go for the fourth bar before they get rid of bars all-together.
